description: Represents the result of running CFLint
title: Result

___version.description: The version of CFLint that products these results
___version.title: Version

___timestamp.description: A timestamp representing the Unix epoch time when these results were generated
___timestamp.title: Timestamp

___counts.description: Provides counts for the results of running CFLint
___counts.title: Counts

___countByCode.description: List of issue codes with their respective issue counts
___countByCode.title: Count by Code

items.description: The count of issues found for each distinct issue code
items.title: Code Count

___count.description: The issue count for the current issue code
___count.title: Current Count

___code.description: The current issue code being counted
___code.title: Current Code

___totalLines.description: The total number of lines of code scanned
___totalLines.title: Total Lines

___totalFiles.description: The total number of files read during this scan
___totalFiles.title: Total Files

___countBySeverity.description: List of issue severities with their respective issue counts
___countBySeverity.title: Count by Severity

items.description: The count of issues found for each distinct issue severity
items.title: Severity Count

___count.description: The issue count for the current severity
___count.title: Current Count

___severity.description: The current issue severity being counted
___severity.title: Current Severity

___issues.description: A list of issues reported by CFLint
___issues.title: Issues

___severity.description: The severity level of the issue
___severity.title: Severity

___id.description: Unique identifier of the rule used to find the issue
___id.title: ID

___locations.description: A list of locations that the issue occurs
___locations.title: Locations

items.description: Properties of the individual issue reported
items.title: Location

___expression.description: The expression in which the issue was found
___expression.title: Expression

___variable.description: The variable name for which the issue was found
___variable.title: Variable

___function.description: The function in which or for which the issue was found
___function.title: Function

___column.description: The column number of the starting position at which the issue was found
___column.title: Column

___message.description: A message describing this specific issue
___message.title: Message

___line.description: The line number of the starting position at which the issue was found
___line.title: Line

___file.description: Full file path to the file in which the issue was found
___file.title: File

___fileName.description: Just the file name in which the issue was found
___fileName.title: File name

___abbrev.description: An abbreviation of the rule used to find the issue
___abbrev.title: Abbreviation
